header.h2: Coronavirus (COVID-19) Update: Arrow Academy Campuses Closed Through the Remainder of the 2019-2020 School Year

div.p: The Governor of Texas closed schools physically for face-to-face instruction for all schools in Texas through the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. However, Arrow Academy will continue remote and digital learning through May 22, 2020 as required by the Texas Education Agency.

div.style: position: absolute; overflow: hidden; left: 0px; top: 0px; width: 1850px; height: 923px;

img.alt: Students holding bunny and guinea pig.

div.div: The Governor of Texas closed schools physically for face-to-face instruction for all schools in Texas through the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. However, Arrow Academy will continue remote and digital learning through May 22, 2020 as required by the Texas Education Agency.

h3.a: Texas Education Agency: Apart We Stand Together

div.div: It takes all of us to save lives. If we work together, fewer of our friends and family will be affected by Coronavirus.
